programme.title: The Story of
programme.desc: Documentary charting the remarkable career trajectory of Adele Adkins, the pop and soul singer who rose from humble beginnings in Tottenham to become one of the biggest stars of the modern music industry. Now popular enough to warrant going by her forename only, Adele's interest in music was encouraged by her mother from an early age. Winning a place at the Brit School in Croydon, Adele first shot into the public eye when her friend uploaded a demo to MySpace in 2006, and by the time she graduated, the singer had already secured a record deal. What followed were three hugely successful albums, 19, 21 and 25, each of which surpassed the last in terms of critical acclaim and sales figures. Adele also scored an Oscar in 2013 for her song Skyfall, which featured as the theme of the James Bond film of the same name.(n)

programme.title: Floogals
programme.desc: The gang play with different colour paints - and things soon get very messy.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Things get out of hand at Lucy's elf-and-fairy birthday party when Princess Holly and her friends participate in a magic show.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Zeta steals Samira's staff and turns everyone into chickens.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Fizzy is convinced she has turned Grumpy into a giant on the day his little brother is coming round for tea.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George and Peppa go on a sailing trip, but their boat runs aground.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The elves and fairies set off in a spaceship to Planet Bong when aliens ask the Wise Old Elf to save their hot and sandy planet, but an onboard jelly flood threatens the mission.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The heroes crash on a frozen alien planet, and are forced to join forces with an old enemy to survive.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: The Championship
programme.desc: Colin Murray presents highlights from the latest games in the Championship, which included Sheffield Wednesday v Queens Park Rangers at Hillsborough, Leeds United v Preston North End at Elland Road and Hull City v Burton Albion at the KCOM Stadium.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: Goal Rush
programme.desc: Goals from the weekend's games in Leagues One and Two, which included Blackburn Rovers v Doncaster Rovers at Ewood Park, Plymouth Argyle v Charlton Athletic at Home Park and Grimsby Town v Coventry City at Blundell Park.(n)

programme.title: Haunted Honeymoon
programme.desc: A radio actor preparing to marry begins to suffer panic attacks that threaten his career. When he takes his fiancee to meet his eccentric extended family, they conspire to scare him out of his neuroses with a fake haunting - but something supernatural really is lurking in the family estate. Comedy, directed by and starring Gene Wilder. With Dom DeLuise and Gilda Radner.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Iain Lee narrates a collection of comic clips featuring cats that have taken the internet by storm.(n)

programme.title: Now That's Funny
programme.desc: Another selection of internet-sourced videos, including a woman attempting to break a world record with marshmallows and holiday-makers travelling to unwise destinations.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Disobedient Dogs Make You Laugh Out Loud.
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos featuring rebellious dogs doing bizarre and humorous things.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Dads Make You Laugh Out Loud.
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos featuring fathers doing bizarre things, including a showcase of the world's most ridiculous dad dancing and some DIY dentistry using a helicopter to remove a loose tooth. With contributions from comedians Ellie Taylor, Angela Barnes and Dave Spikey.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Brides Make You Laugh Out Loud.
programme.desc: Iain Lee narrates a collection of internet videos featuring bizarre and humorous weddings.(n)

programme.title: Cats Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos, including cats playing musical instruments, dressed in costumes and riding on vacuum cleaners, as well as introducing felines so famous they have their own Hollywood agents. The programme also features the owners who dream up the ideas for these online films, and bloggers who have made a fortune cashing in on their popularity, while behaviour experts are on hand to analyse and explain the physiological characteristics of the pets. Narrated by Iain Lee, with commentary by Susan Calman.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Agents Paul and Steve face a moral dilemma in south London, when they find out the tenant they have been instructed to evict is on his way to a funeral. Elsewhere, Stewart and Victor chase £1,000 from a debtor who has defaulted on his payment plan, but they are subjected to abuse and the police are called to a driveway standoff. Plus, two agents try to recover £1,600 worth of goods from the owner of an entertainment company after a wedding day dispute, and in west London, a landlady is owned £9,000 in rent arrears by a young mother.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In east London, High Court Enforcement Agents Paul and Phil are involved in a brothel eviction, while in south Wales, Stewart and Elmore chase a debt owed by a working mum. Another case sees Stewart and Victor hunting down a £3,000 debt owed by a Liverpool takeaway for rent arrears.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: A chance to catch up with the latest events inside the house as the celebrities cope with living under constant surveillance, with all the arguments and alliances, as well as the revelations in the diary room.(n)

programme.title: Autopsy
programme.sub-title: The Last Days of Cory Monteith.
programme.desc: Forensic pathologist Jason Payne-James investigates the reasons behind the death of the Glee star in a Vancouver hotel room at the age of 31.(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A romantic novelist is attracted to her next door neighbour. When he is murdered, she finds her infatuation makes her the prime suspect. With no one to turn to, she decides to clear her name by investigating the case herself, but digging into the victim's past only brings her more trouble. Crime thriller, starring Dina Meyer, Woody Jeffreys and Cory Monteith.(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: An Afghanistan War veteran living in London seeks revenge against his pregnant girlfriend's killer by assuming an upper-class identity and using his connections in the Chinese mob(n)

programme.title: Trade
programme.desc: After his 13-year-old sister is abducted by sex traffickers, a determined Mexican teen travels from the barrios of Mexico City to a run-down stash house in New Jersey in a desperate attempt to rescue the frightened girl before she is swallowed whole by one of the criminal underworld's darkest secrets. Jorge's (Cesar Ramos) adolescent sister, Adriana (Paulina Gaitan), has been kidnapped and thrust into a lucrative underground trade in which young girls are bought and sold to the highest bidder. Now, as the terrified youngster is herded through a complex network of underground tunnels leading into the United States, her only ally is a Polish woman named Veronica (Alicja Bachleda), who has been tricked into the trade by the same nefarious gang. After circumventing immigration officers and eventually working his way across the border, the desperate Jorge comes into contact with a Texas lawman named Ray (Kevin Kline), whose own devastating personal loss to sex traffickers causes him to join the search for Adriana. In the dark days that follow, Jorge and Ray form a close bond as they witness the horrors of a secret Internet sex slave auction and discover just how far the depths of human depravity can plunge while attempting to maintain hope that brother and sister will one day be reunited. In the world of international sex trafficking, however, innocent victims disappear without a trace every day and few who fall prey to these reprehensible predators are ever seen again(n)

programme.title: Fido
programme.desc: This lively black comedy turns the zombie movie on its undead head. Billy Connolly is a howl as a zombie who's been domesticated to do work around a suburban couple's home, where he befriends their young son. All goes well until his electrified collar goes on the fritz and he reverts to his bloodthirsty, flesh-eating ways(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: In Alexander Payne's bittersweet comedy, two buddies, Miles and Jack, embark on Jack's stag week, a tasting trip around California's wine country, with oenophile Miles leading the way. Miles may be a wine expert but he's also a bitter divorcee, depressed and in love with a waitress, Maya, whose presence always leaves him tongue-tied. Jack is a faded actor who can't quite resign himself to marriage when there are still obtainable women in the world, married or not, and when he meets Stephanie at a tasting, he swears Miles to secrecy about the wedding. And so the foursome continue their trip... Alexander Payne's Oscar and BAFTA-winning road trip is a classic of friendship and crisis, with four outstanding leads(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as Nathaniel Ayers, a former violin prodigy whose bouts with schizophrenia landed him on the streets after two years of schooling at Juilliard. Steve Lopez is a disenchanted journalist dealing with a recent divorce. Steve is wandering through Los Angeles' Skid Row when he spots Ayers. The more Steve learns about Ayers, the more he longs to help the troubled soul(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Two-time Academy Award winner Tom Hanks delivers an outstanding performance in this excellent Oscar winning Drama. Chuck Noland is a Fed-Ex manager who demands that everything must be on time and travels the world to make sure punctuality is on top of everything else. He has a girlfriend, Kelly, with whom he is deeply in love with and family he hardly sees. When work intrudes on Christmas Eve, Chuck has a quick gift exchange in the car and kisses Kelly goodbye. He boards a delivery plane going overseas which gets caught in a horrendous storm and crashes into the Pacific. The sole survivor Chuck washes up on a remote island along with several Fed-Ex packages that he must use for supplies. With limited luxury, he adapts to the island over the course of 1,500 nights(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its oppressive faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey outside of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Humans and orcs clash in this film adaptation of the popular video-game series(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Eerie saga about a rare-book buyer who becomes a target of unknown forces when he's asked to find a volume about the Devil(n)

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: Following the life of cocaine-trafficking pioneer George Jung in a way that recalls Martin Scorsese's Casino, Blow recounts the man's days from his 1950s childhood in Boston to his downfall in the 1980s. George (played by Johnny Depp) begins his life as the son of Fred (Ray Liotta), an earnest breadwinner, and Ermine (Rachel Griffiths), who frequently walks out on them in pursuit of a more fulfilling life. When George moves west to California in the late '60s, accompanied by best pal Tuna (Ethan Suplee), he becomes an entrepreneur in the marijuana business, which soon spreads to the East Coast as well, with girlfriend Barbara (Franka Potente) smuggling the product during her stewardess shifts. George is arrested in 1972 -- at which time Barbara dies of cancer -- but George finds a new ally in Diego (Jordi Molla), who proposes the idea that he become the American conduit for Colombian kingpin Pablo Escobar (Cliff Curtis). George flourishes in the heyday of the disco era, and falls for Mirtha (Penelope Cruz), a self-serving bombshell who eventually has a daughter with him. Trouble escalates as the FBI threatens to bring George and his crew down, while he desperately tries to be a stable parent to his young offspring. Blow also features Paul Reubens and Max Perlich in featured roles(n)

programme.title: From Hell
programme.desc: Johnny Depp stars in this intense psychological spin on the horrific legend of Jack the Ripper(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two straight-laced friends pose as drug dealers and try their best -- and sometimes fail -- to fit in with the thug circle in order to retrieve a stolen kitten(n)

programme.title: Manhunter
programme.desc: Dark thriller about an ex-FBI forensic investigator who is called in to track down a brutal serial killer known as 'the Tooth Fairy'. To help him understand the mind of his quarry, he visits the prison which holds an old adversary of his - notorious serial killer Dr Hannibal 'the Cannibal' Lektor. But the investigation comes to threaten his sanity and the lives of his family(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: Enterprising teenager Joel Goodsen turns his parents' house into a brothel when they go out of town on a trip(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror thriller, an unconventional exorcist battles a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: This outlandish comedy set in the golden age of showbiz centers on a slick Hollywood fixer named Eddie Mannix, who is pressed into action when a superstar actor is kidnapped and held for ransom. Mannix must race to quietly collect the ransom money before the gossip mags catch wind of the scandal(n)

programme.title: Rock Star
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars in this modern-day fairy tale about the lead singer of a heavy-metal tribute band who joins the real group when its front man quits, and immediately gets in way over his head in a dizzying world of sex, drugs, and rock and roll. Jennifer Aniston, Timothy Spall, Dominic West, Jason Bonham, Timothy Olyphant, Jason Flemyng(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: Two Puerto Rican NYC cops (Luis Guzman and Edgar Garcia) are asked by a pair of French fashion designers (Alice Taglioni and Frederic Anscombre) to come to Paris to hunt down the counterfeiters who stole a couture handbag. Rosie Perez and Rosario Dawson co-star. Directed by Ian Edelman(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Two US marines who fought together in war are reunited in a battle against the military. When one of the men is threatened with court martial for his involvement in the death of 83 civilians, he calls on his former colleague, who is embittered by his Vietnam injuries, to act as his attorney. As the men seek revenge against the military system, a high-level political conspiracy unravels(n)

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: After his wife gives birth to a stillborn child, the American ambassador to Britain switches two kids in their hospital cribs. What he doesn't know is that little Damien is the Anti-Christ. Seminal 70s horror(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widow making ends meet as a psychic (Elizabeth Reaser) is stunned when she obtains a Ouija board that actually enables her to talk to the dead. While it's great for her business, the board also allows a vengeful ghost to possess her nine-year-old daughter (Lulu Wilson). Directed by Mike Flanagan, this horror sequel co-stars Annalise Basso, Henry Thomas, and Doug Jones(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror thriller, an unconventional exorcist battles a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Writer-director Paul W.S. Anderson's turbo-charged, slam-bang tune-up of Roger Corman's 1975 cult vehicle "Death Race 2000" follows the non-stop action taking place during a do-or-die contest pitting a convict (Jason Statham) against other cons, with the winner walking off with his freedom. Anderson admits to being "a big fan of the Corman movie," and this reworking is a glowing salute to Corman's original. Corman also serves as one of the film's producers, along with Anderson and Tom Cruise(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a group of extreme athletes who are using their specialized skills to pull off a series of complex crimes. Remake of the 1991 cult hit of the same name(n)

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: Paul Newman racked up an Oscar reprising his role from "The Hustler", a pool shark who takes a hotshot under his wing(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: An Afghanistan War veteran living in London seeks revenge against his pregnant girlfriend's killer by assuming an upper-class identity and using his connections in the Chinese mob(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Conjoined Fetus Lady. While the kids of South Park are on the bus to China for the Dodgeball World Championships, the townsfolk make an effort to make the school nurse, who happens to have a dead fetus hanging off the side of her face, comfortable. Having won the championship, the kids return just in time for the festivities, including the Conjoined Fetus parade(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Elementary School Musical. When the all-singing, all-dancing musical craze hits South Park, the boys must embrace it or relinquish their popularity(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Proper Condom Use. The impulsive implementation of sex-education classes at school leads to an all-out battle between the boys and the girls(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Butt Out. After representatives from the anti-smoking campaign make a song and dance about it for the children of South Park Elementary, the boys take up the nasty habit(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: #REHASH. Season 18 sees the unrivalled comedy still as crude, rude and relevant as ever(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: #HappyHolograms. The boys are back as South Park returns with brand new episodes, exclusive to Comedy Central! Season 18 sees the unrivalled comedy still as crude, rude and relevant as ever(n)

programme.title: Key & Peele
programme.desc: MC Mom. Sketches include a gangster taking part in a drive-by; a mom writing a song for her son; two scam artists competing against one another; an "Undercover Boss" revealing himself; Big Boi running into André 3000; and two guys getting into a car accident(n)

programme.title: Key & Peele
programme.desc: Meegan & Andre Break Up. Sketches include two friends arguing at a club; Meegan and André having a serious discussion; a rapper walking out of an interview; Conrad flying business select; and a man sporting a new mustache(n)

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid Programming(n)

programme.title: Get on track with Cue
programme.desc: Discover the best vaping experience available. Cue Vapor is vaping made simple. A spill-proof, easy to use, disposable cartridge vaping system available in a variety of colors and flavors(n)

programme.title: Try Total Gym for $14.95
programme.desc: Total Gym Fit is the only piece of fitness equipment you need to get into the best shape of your life! 30 Day Risk-Free Trial for only $14.95. Call today!(n)

programme.title: PiYo Workout!
programme.desc: Define your body with PiYo. Chalene Johnson's new lower-impact workout series combining the muscle-sculpting benefits of Pilates, Yoga and fluid motion all-in-one!(n)

programme.title: Scrubs
programme.desc: My Point of No Return. In the season 6 finale, J.D. and Elliot both wonder if they really belong with their respective partners. Needing a little help, the Janitor activates the Brain Trust(n)

programme.title: Scrubs
programme.desc: My Own Worst Enemy. J.D. and Elliot evaluate their relationships; Turk attempts to limit his sugar intake by allowing himself only one kind of candy bar; Dr. Cox struggles to diagnose a patient; and the Janitor has a new paramour(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Laurie and the Professor. Eric gets dirt on Laurie via her former professor; Hyde seeks space away from Eric; Donna's parents bicker through her(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Halloween. Growing up is bad enough, without having to do it in '70s America. Follow a group of friends as they do battle with hormones, parents and dodgy fashion(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Vanstock. After Jackie declines, Kelso invites Laurie to a festival, which doesn't escape Donna, but better miss Jackie, for Kelso's sake(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: I Love Cake. Bob and Midge's marital troubles spill over into a fight over Donna's affection(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Sleepover. Eric is ecstatic when Donna spends the night(n)

programme.title: Joe Dirt
programme.desc: In this comedy from the producing team behind Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo, David Spade portrays Joe Dirt, a janitor with a mullet hairdo who currently works as a janitor in the rural West Coast. An on-air radio deejay (Dennis Miller) recounts his life story as a white-trash reject who, at age eight, was abandoned by his mean-spirited birth parents (Roseanne and Gary Busey) at the Grand Canyon. Years later, Joe Dirt attempts to seek out his birth parents and discover the mystery of why they dismissed him. Going from one misadventure to another, Joe's life unfolds on the radio show where his life story becomes a sensation to the locals. Joe Dirt was produced by Adam Sandler's production company, Happy Madison, and features the screen debut of rock star Kid Rock in a supporting role as Joe Dirt's rival(n)

programme.desc: Part two of two. Edd China continues to renovate the Triumph Spitfire, replacing the differential and rear shock absorbers and having the bumpers and handles chromed.(n)

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer goes in search of a rust-free Triumph Stag, a task that proves much more difficult than he first thought - and when he eventually finds a car for Edd China, the mechanic has to perform repairs on a tight budget to keep a profit in sight.(n)

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer tries to double his money by working with expert mechanic Edd China to turn an Austin-Healey Frogeye Sprite into a quality classic car. Once completed, the duo test-drive it around the Brooklands Motor Museum in Surrey, prior to selling it on at a profit.(n)

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer finds a rust-free Triumph TR6 sports car from the 1970s that he wants to restore, but first mechanic Edd China has to rebuild the engine.(n)

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer seeks to get his hands on an expensive BMW 2002tii, and if he is to stay on budget, he must take a gamble on a model that has not been started for 17 years.(n)

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer tries to track down the first-ever Bond car, a 1963 Sunbeam Alpine. He finds a rust-free, race-ready motor, but Edd China discovers some surprises in the engine bay.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: South Carlton, Lincolnshire: Saxon Burials on the Ridge.
programme.desc: Alerted to the presence of an Anglo-Saxon cemetery in a field in South Carlton, Lincolnshire, by artefacts found by amateur detectorists, the team sets out to establish its age, size and length of use. The discovery of a skeleton and twisted shield sends the excavation off in a new direction. Presented by Tony Robinson.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Loch Migdale, Sutherland: The Island in the Lake.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team try to piece together the story of prehistoric life in the Highlands. They excavate underwater to explore a mysterious island in Loch Migdale and also investigate a ritual henge monument from the Bronze Age.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: In the 1940s, Basil Brown, the man who discovered Sutton Hoo, believed he had uncovered the remains of the largest Roman villa in East Anglia. In Suffolk, Tony Robinson and the team arrive at an Ipswich suburb to see if he was right - but to find out, they have to dig up a few back gardens and patios.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team take part in a dig at 15th-century Prebendal Manor in Northamptonshire to unearth a Saxon hall alleged to have belonged to King Canute. However, they first have to rip up the floorboards of the Grade I-listed property.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Wittenham Clumps, Oxfordshire: Fertile Soils, Rich Archaeology.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson visits Wittenham to piece together clues to one of the most extensive Iron Age landscapes discovered in Britain. A major feature of the area is a hill fort from which vast expanses of Oxfordshire and the Thames can be seen. However, little is known about a much larger neighbouring prominence less than 150 metres away, so the team tries to uncover its secrets.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Goldcliff, Newport: Rescuing a Mesolithic Foreshore.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team battle to conserve evidence of England's first inhabitants and an ancient way of life, which was gathered from the River Severn. Flints, food remains and - most remarkably - fossilised footsteps - on the foreshore at Goldcliff, near Newport, need to be saved and recorded before the strong tide washes them away.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Oakamoor, Staffordshire: In Search of a Medieval Blast Furnace.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team return to a cottage in Oakamoor, Staffordshire, where remains of a blast furnace were unearthed during the programme's 2003 Big Dig. Having already established that iron smelting was going on in the Elizabethan age, they set out to prove the quiet rural valley had been a centre of heavy industry since the Middle Ages.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Green Island, Dorset: The Island of Finds.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson heads to Green Island in the centre of Poole Harbour, Dorset, which is now a haven for weekend sailors having been arguably the country's busiest and most important port during the Iron Age. Over the course of three days, the team tries to establish whether the area was once the site of an early form of mass production.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Syndale, Kent: The Fort That Wasn't There.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team have three days to discover whether the Syndale Park Motel in Kent is built on the site of Britain's first Roman fort after the grounds yielded ditches, ramparts, coins and pottery. If so, it could prove the existence of a supply line established when the invading Roman army swept toward London.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: A search for the remains of Roxburgh, formerly one of Scotland's great medieval centres, which eventually fell into decline and disappeared in the 16th century. With only a ruined castle as a clue to the lost city's layout, Phil Harding and his army of diggers have just three days to peel back the layers of history and identify the royal seat of David I, which was burnt to the ground in 1460. Presented by Tony Robinson.(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.sub-title: Cranborne Chase, Dorset: Brimming with Remains.
programme.desc: The team explores the many delights of Dorset farmer Simon Meadon's fields. Crammed with finds, from a possible Romano-British villa to a Bronze Age boundary ditch, the site is a complex one, and the work is increased by the important discovery of a number of burials. With just three days to unpick thousands of years of history, the experts struggle to unearth what made the area so special.(n)

programme.desc: Festive edition of the long-running comedy from 2005, written by Roy Clarke. After a hard day playing Father Christmas, Smiler has a stiff drink to revive himself. Unfortunately, the alcohol has the opposite effect and his friends are forced to drag his lifeless body about the village - arousing the interest of the local constabulary. Stephen Lewis, June Whitfield and Trevor Bannister star.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Howard calls on Alvin, who's invited Clegg and Truly round for Christmas dinner. The perennial adulterer is wearing Marina's pullover in case she should happen to stop by - but is forced to make a lightning change when wife Pearl turns up instead. Festive special of the long-running comedy, first aired in 2006, starring Peter Sallis, Frank Thornton, Brian Murphy and Robert Fyfe.(n)

programme.title: Maisie Raine
programme.desc: Maisie investigates a fire-bombing at the home of a former policeman who suspects he's being targeted by an ex-convict, and Tomlin receives a series of obscene phone calls from someone who always knows when she's alone. Pauline Quirke and Rakie Ayola star.(n)

programme.title: Murdoch Mysteries
programme.desc: The sudden death of a bicycle racer leaves Dr Grace struggling to determine the cause. With Julia's assistance, she performs her first brain bisection in her quest for the truth. However, just as she appears to be getting close to reaching a conclusion, the discovery of an injection mark on the victim's arm seems to contradict her findings. Drama, starring Georgina Reilly, Helene Joy and Yannick Bisson star.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: The chance discovery of a cache of explosives plunges Jim headlong into another multiple murder investigation. As the death toll mounts, he finds his hardest job is establishing a motive - there may be an Irish connection, or a sinister criminal mastermind could be responsible. Mark McManus stars as the Caledonian copper, with James Macpherson and Iain Anders.(n)

programme.title: Waking the Dead
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. When the only living victim of a jailed serial killer starts being harassed by a stalker, Boyd is given the chance to prove his theory that the murderer had a partner who is still on the loose. Starring Trevor Eve and Sue Johnston.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: Bob Hoskins stars in the first of a lavish two-part adventure based on Arthur Conan Doyle's novel about a British scientific team's 1911 expedition into the uncharted Amazon jungle in search of prehistoric life. Maverick Professor Challenger leads the quest for a mythical plateau, aiming to prove his theory that dinosaurs still roam certain parts of the Earth.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: When a couple fail to turn up at the airport for a flight to Italy and their dog is found brutally killed in what appears to be a burglary at their home, suspicion falls on their son, who holds a grudge against his father for turning him in for possession of a class A drug. A neighbour produces mobile phone footage of the family car being torched by teenagers, one of whom is known to the police, and the case takes an unexpected twist when the Sun Hill team starts tracking the missing persons' bank account. Former EastEnders actor Stuart Laing (Rob Minter) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Kirsty calls for help when a woman is found unconscious and with multiple injuries beneath an open window. Callum eventually responds, having just learned of his father's death, but as the investigation slowly uncovers the activities and relationships of the residents of the house, the sergeant's distracted behaviour leads to a furious outburst against his colleague witnessed by Inspector Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Callum returns to work, determined to uncover the truth about the rape allegation that blackened his dead father's name as a police officer and divided the family for 20 years. Kirsty is shocked by the sergeant's brusque attitude in handling a vulnerable witness, and Smithy eventually realises his troubled colleague will stop at nothing to get a result against a knife-wielding blackmailer. Guest starring Lesley Vickerage (The Inspector Lynley Mysteries) and David Schofield (Pirates of the Caribbean).(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part series finale, a 14-year-old dies in Smithy's arms following a stabbing incident, and CCTV footage reveals he had been acting as a `mule' for the older members of a gang. One of Mickey's informants is spotted at the crime scene and eventually gives vital evidence pointing to the most likely culprit, but the detective fears for her safety when she is released on bail and returns to the estate.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Sister Julienne receives an SOS from Holloway Prison, whose usual maternity workers have been struck down by illness, and when she and Trixie step in to help, the nun puts her reputation on the line to prevent a heavily pregnant convict having her unborn baby taken away by social services. Shelagh faces heartache when a routine pregnancy check reveals something far more serious, Alec has a confession for Jenny, and Fred takes the gang to the theatre to celebrate Chummy's birthday - only for the trip to end in disaster. Lacey Turner, best known as EastEnders' Stacey Branning, guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny has an eventful few days, starting with a patient who as well as having herself to worry about, is also struggling to cope with her mother, an agoraphobic who hasn't been outside for at least 12 years. On top of that, Alec asks the midwife to accompany him to Brighton for the weekend, leaving her wondering if his intentions are strictly honourable. However, things soon take a tragic turn. Meanwhile, Shelagh joins the local choir to take her mind off her problems. Jessica Raine, Leo Staar and Laura Main star.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: The nuns and midwives are busy preparing for Sister Evangelina's surprise jubilee celebrations, marking 50 years since she took her vows, but a face from the past threatens to ruin the party for the guest of honour. It's back to business when a young woman with Down's syndrome is brought in feeling unwell. To everyone's surprise, they discover she is six months pregnant, causing some of them to think the worst, and the staff are joined by new nurse Patsy, whose sense of humour and no-nonsense attitude make her an instant hit.(n)

programme.title: Catherine Cookson's The Tide of Life
programme.desc: While her father is away, a woman is content with her position as a housekeeper - until a death throws her life into turmoil. Feature-length period drama, starring Gillian Kearney, John Bowler, Ray Stevenson and Susie Burton.(n)

programme.title: The Musketeers
programme.desc: A drunken Athos takes a woman hostage in the town square and his friends are shocked to discover it is none other than Milady - but when it turns out that d'Artagnan knows her, a rift develops between the Musketeers that threatens to tear them apart, giving the Cardinal and his spy the ammunition they need to finally wreak their deadly revenge against the king's soldiers. But as Milady revisits her dark past, she puts Constance in danger - can the Musketeers re-band in time to bring Milady and Richelieu to justice?.(n)

programme.title: Bring It On
programme.desc: The hard work, dedication, and personal politics behind "rah rah rah!" and "sis boom bah!" go under the microscope in this engaging teen comedy. Torrance Shipman (Kirsten Dunst) discovers that being captain of her San Diego high school's six-time championship-winning cheerleading squad is more complicated than she had imagined. Torrance's parents want her to spend more time on her homework, her boyfriend wants her to spend more time with him, and she learns that the squad's former captain stole some of their best routines from other teams -- and that Isis (Gabrielle Union), captain of a top squad at a crosstown, inner-city high school, plans to fight back this year. To make things worse, when one of the cheerleaders is injured, Torrance is forced to replace her with Missy (Eliza Dushku), a cynical new kid who is involved only because the school doesn't offer gymnastics. In the midst of this chaos, with the national championship around the corner, Torrance couldn't have picked a worse time to fall in love with Cliff (Jesse Bradford), a classmate who cares a lot more about punk rock than school spirit. Dunst trained with a cheerleading squad for her role, though a double performed the more complicated stunts(n)

Sci-fi adventure, starring Saoirse Ronan, Max Irons and William Hurt.(n)

programme.desc: The couch-potato TV critics reveal what they think of Doctor Who, Countdown, George Clarke's Amazing Spaces and I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!. First broadcast in November 2013.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The couch-potato critics provide running commentary on another selection of TV programmes from the comfort of their sofa, casting their eyes over I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!, Stephen Hawking: A Brief History of Mine, and Robbie Williams: One Night at the Palladium. First aired in December 2013.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane presents the ultimate countdown between cats and dogs. This puss v pooch special features singing, dancing and a chance to see who is better at using the toilet. Plus, a handyman cat, a dog at the barbers and a woman who believes she's a cat.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers
programme.desc: Sketch makes a freehand fire-breather out of squaddie Paul's horny devils, while the artists also deal with a woman with a tattoo of her favourite food, a man with a lewd and lengthy leprechaun that his wife wants him to be rid of, and a pitiful pop portrait that looks more like a famous footballer.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted and Barney decide to adopt a child together when they become fed up with women during Thanksgiving. However, they soon spiral into couple-like behaviour and have an argument. Elsewhere, Marshall and Lily agree to move to the suburbs.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily and Marshall throw a housewarming party but things get off to a bad start when Ted nearly comes to blows with Marshall's boss, Barney chats up a crazy divorcee, and Mickey's basement honey business gets out of control. Comedy, starring Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Amusing internet videos, including the toughest dog, the coolest man and the cheekiest monkeys on the web.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Amusing internet videos, including a noisy nightstand that resembles Chewbacca's call, and a youngster that impersonates the sound of a siren.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three pairs of partners from Manchester compete to win the £1,000 prize, including married couple of 19 years Fiona and Ian, who kick off the competition with a Spanish-inspired meal. Later, young newlyweds Lauren and Pete shock their guests with a mature and refined menu, while Karl and Mukta serve up Indian-themed dishes alongside a few surprises.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Greater Manchester compete to win the £1,000 prize, including Amy and Matt, who kick off the competition with a varied menu that causes chaos in their kitchen. The second dinner party of the week sees Paula and Andy prepare a selection of family favourites, but Sharon's husband Simon raises a few eyebrows when he makes a frank admission at the dinner table.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Omnibus. Cindy is alarmed over news of Armstrong, and Dirk has a plan. Zack feels under pressure, while Hunter and Neeta's day out is ruined. Meanwhile, Luke covers for Darren.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea: Ibiza
programme.desc: Relations between Frankie and best friend Emily take a turn for the worse after meddling from Harry, while Sam Prince tries to pick himself up after he and Toff decide on a break.(n)

programme.title: Escape from Planet Earth
programme.desc: A heroic alien space explorer travels to Earth in response to a distress call. When he ends up being captured by the military and imprisoned in the infamous Area 51, it falls to his timid, nerdy brother to save him. Animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Rob Corddry, Brendan Fraser and Sarah Jessica Parker.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos on the themes of food and animals.(n)

programme.title: Kevin Can Wait
programme.desc: Kevin learns that his childhood enemy is trying to reserve the church for his daughter's marriage, on the same day that Kendra wants it for her wedding. Comedy, with Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly reignites a long-standing feud after she invites Murray's unreliable brother to visit at Thanksgiving. Meanwhile, Adam upsets the balance of power between him and Barry after he wins a ball game between them for the first time. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica's new job at the department store is put in jeopardy when Beverly takes advantage of her daughter's employee discount too frequently. Meanwhile, during a trip to the horse racing track, Pops bends the truth to convince Barry that his bad luck has changed for the better. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly and Murray fall out over Barry's plan to perform his martial arts routine at the annual high school talent show. Pops buys Erica an electric guitar, urging her to take to the stage and sing. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is caught in a battle of wills between Sheldon and Penny, while Leonard tries to reignite his long-distance relationship with Priya, who has moved back to India. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard inadvertently gives the impression he is attracted to Amy when he accompanies her to a colleague's wedding. Meanwhile, Howard tries to persuade Bernadette they should live with his mother after getting married and suggests a trial run of the arrangement over the weekend.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj feels upset about not being in a relationship, so Penny sets out to find a date and introduces him to a girl he can actually talk to. They hit it off, but when it becomes apparent he has been buying her expensive gifts, his friends suspect she is only interested in his wealth.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon's old adversary Wil Wheaton returns and invites everyone to a house-warming party. Leonard is eager to go, but Sheldon threatens to shun him if he attends. However, he soon changes his mind when he finds out that Star Trek: The Next Generation actor Brent Spiner will also be there.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon's mother comes to visit and woos the gang, but he cannot help feeling jealous of all the attention she is receiving - until a bout of illness lays him low, and he suddenly sees the benefits of having her around. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon hires an attractive female assistant, but when she becomes interested in Leonard, Penny decides to mark her territory by sleeping with him. Meanwhile, Howard starts to lose his mind when his return from space is delayed another week. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is not pleased when his assistant Alex starts flirting with Leonard and has a word with her about it. Unfortunately, his comments are so inappropriate that he is accused of sexual harassment and sent to the university's human resources department, where he ends up dragging Leonard, Raj and Howard into trouble too. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon learns of a machine that will help him understand human emotions. Penny tries to help her brother get a job, and Raj asks his ex-girlfriends why he is still single.(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: A teenager falls in love with a new girl in his school, only to discover she is a witch. As dark secrets from her family's past emerge, they discover that on her 16th birthday, she will be required to choose a side in a conflict between good and evil. Fantasy based on Kami Garcia's novel, starring Alden Ehrenreich, Alice Englert, Jeremy Irons and Emma Thompson.(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: Comedian Bill Bailey narrates a documentary examining the lives of an eccentric cast of unconventional and unusual creatures that do things differently, turning this oddness to their advantage, such as the parrot that has forgotten how to fly, the bear that has turned vegetarian and a penguin that lives in the forest.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: Roughly once every 40 years in the northern Kalahari Desert of Botswana an ancient waterway called the Savute channel fills and flows into the surrounding marshes. This attracts thousands of grazing animals from across the region - and also draws predators to the area. This documentary follows the fortunes of Africa's largest herd of elephants and a pride of seven lions as they come face to face in an epic fight for survival, with drought having weakened the elephants and the lions desperately hungry. Narrated by Imogen Stubbs.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.sub-title: Return of the Giant Killers: Africa's Lion Kings.
programme.desc: Documentary revisiting the pride of African lions featured in Africa's Giant Killers: Natural World, which detailed a clash between drought-weakened elephants and hungry big cats in the northern stretches of the Kalahari Desert in Botswana. This follow-up rejoins the pride at the start of the rainy season, when the departure of the elephants brings a whole host of new problems for the lions. The males begin to turn against each other, and one inexperienced lioness places her cubs in mortal danger as a rival group challenges the area's resident lions. Wild fires caused by lightning devastate the landscape, and as the dust begins to settle, the pride must once again face off with the elephants or risk starvation. Narrated by Imogen Stubbs.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: Documentary shot over the course of two years, providing an insight into work at Chengdu Research Base in central China. The programme details how workers at the sanctuary hope to breed 300 pandas as part of an ambitious conservation project, the final aim being to introduce them back into the wild and help bring the creatures back from the brink of extinction. Narrated by David Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Mountain Lions: Life on the Edge
programme.desc: The trials and tribulations of two mountain lion families as they raise their kittens in the spectacular Rocky Mountains in Wyoming. David Attenborough narrates.(n)

programme.title: Clever Monkeys
programme.desc: Documentary examining strikingly human-like behaviour patterns in other primates, discovering examples of simian intelligence in langurs, pygmy marmosets - which `farm' tree sap - and white-faced capuchins who tenderly nurse the victims of battle. David Attenborough narrates.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: Comedian Bill Bailey narrates a documentary examining the lives of an eccentric cast of unconventional and unusual creatures that do things differently, turning this oddness to their advantage, such as the parrot that has forgotten how to fly, the bear that has turned vegetarian and a penguin that lives in the forest.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: A look at some of the world's strongest creatures.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: David Attenborough reports on the problems facing the Indian tiger, and how special reserves set up to preserve the species have become a popular target for poachers, with officials turning a blind eye to their activities. Scientist-turned-whistleblower Raghu Chundawat discusses how he faced criminal charges when he tried to expose the problem, and considers what can be done to save the species from extinction.(n)

programme.title: Walrus: Two Tonne Tusker
programme.desc: Reproduction scientist Holley explores walruses' breeding grounds in Northern Alaska in an effort to help captive pacific walrus Sivuqaq become a parent.(n)

programme.title: Killer Whales - Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: A look at research into the lives of the marine mammals, including insights into the creatures' intelligence, social interactions and parental instincts.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates Brad Bestelink's documentary, which was filmed over the course of 18 months and follows a female leopard and its two cubs living in the wilds of Botswana alongside less-than-friendly lions, wild dogs and hyenas. The competition for food is tough, and the cats have to learn the new skill of fishing if they are to have any chance of survival.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.sub-title: Natural World: Honey Badgers - Masters of Mayhem.
programme.desc: Although barely a foot tall, the honey badger has a reputation as one of the most fearless animals in the world, attacking just about anything from venomous snakes to adult lions. This documentary follows a scientist, a beekeeper and a conservationist in South Africa as they set out to discover if the creature is really as fearsome as it is made out to be.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.sub-title: Meerkats: Secrets of an Animal Superstar.
programme.desc: Meerkat pups Squirt and Weeny belong to one of the most famous animal families on the planet and are also part of a 20-year animal behaviour study. David Attenborough narrates the full story of the research, from the early days when it was a challenge to even get close to a meerkat to the latest revelations about these animals and their complex lives.(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across the same men who shot his boss(n)

programme.title: Step Up 2: The Streets
programme.desc: Director Jon M. Chu takes the helm for this Step Up sequel set at the Maryland School for the Arts and following the journey of a rebellious street dancer who struggles to fit in at the prestigious school. Andie (Briana Evigan) may show great promise as a dancer, but she just can't seem to let go of her old life and get a fresh start. With Baltimore's hottest underground dance contest looming on the horizon, Andie joins forces with top dancer Chase (Robert Hoffman) while simultaneously helping to sharpen the skills of her outcast classmates. Perhaps if Andie, Chase, and their talented team of misfit dancers can earn the top slot at The Streets, the troubled new arrival can finally make her dreams a reality while also letting go of the past, and bounding confidently forward into the future(n)

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's classic sci-fi tale about two ordinary Midwesterners who are transformed by extraordinary chance meetings with visitors from outer space. Vilmos Zsigmond won an Oscar for his dazzling cinematography(n)

programme.title: Top Secret!
programme.desc: Another parody from the creators of "Airplane!" this time spoofing WWII spy flicks and 1950s rock-and-roll romps. Val Kilmer. Cedric: Omar Sharif. Hillary: Lucy Gutteridge. Nigel: Christopher Villiers. Bookstore Owner: Peter Cushing. Streck: Jeremy Kemp(n)

programme.title: From Russia with Love
programme.desc: From Russia With Love is the second -- and arguably the best -- James Bond thriller, featuring a tense story that has Agent 007 (Sean Connery) battling Russian spies -- including Lotte Lenya as Rosa Klebb -- and the evil SPECTRE organization, as he searches for a top-secret Russian decoding machine. Though there are many gadgets, the film is the least gimmicky of all the Bond movies, and is powered by several excellent action set pieces, most notably Connery's fight with arch-villain Robert Shaw on a passenger train(n)

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Adaptation of Tom Clancy's novel, with ex-CIA agent Jack Ryan and his family the targets of a terrorist(n)

programme.title: About Last Night
programme.desc: David Mamet's play +Sexual Perversity in Chicago was adapted for the big screen by fellow Chicago citizen Tim Kazurinsky and became About Last Night... The film stars Rob Lowe as Danny and Demi Moore as Debbie. The pair meet and engage in a torrid sexual relationship, but then slowly negotiate if there is anything more between them. Lowe seeks advice from his loudmouthed friend Bernie (Chicago native James Belushi), whose offers little more than outrageous tales of his randy exploits. Debbie confides in her best friend Joan (Elizabeth Perkins), a bitter, single kindergarten teacher who has lost any hope of finding the right person on the dating scene. Although Danny and Debbie talk, they have trouble communicating. The film ends on a coda that suggests the pair are still unsure as to where their relationship may be headed(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks' classic sci-fi parody, starring Mel himself, Bill Pullman, Rick Moranis, John Candy and Joan Rivers. Packed full of more hilarious in-jokes than you can shake a lightsabre at(n)

programme.title: Dr. No
programme.desc: Ian Fleming's suave secret agent 007 makes his big-screen debut in this cheeky and fast-paced spy thriller, the first of a long series of James Bond films. Dr. No is the film that made former body-builder Sean Connery a star. Actress Ursula Andress also made a splash as the bikini-clad seductress who rises from the sea to use Bond to get revenge upon Dr. No. Bond himself is also after No, who, according to Bond's boss M, is about to financially ruin the United States. Bond's search for the crazed extortionist leads him to Jamaica and gets him into a variety of potentially dangerous scrapes, that while nowhere near as elaborate as those in subsequent Bond films, are still exciting(n)

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Adaptation of Tom Clancy's novel, with ex-CIA agent Jack Ryan and his family the targets of a terrorist(n)

programme.title: Mad Max
programme.desc: Futuristic action drama in which highway cops battle predatory motorcyclists(n)

programme.title: Goldfinger
programme.desc: Classic spy thriller. Secret agent James Bond dodges bullets and bowler hats as he investigates the evil empire of Auric Goldfinger, a ruthless and dangerous man with a penchant for gold bullion. Featuring a bevy of Bond beauties, memorable villains, a vast array of gadgetry and a spectacular finale in the vaults of Fort Knox(n)

programme.title: About Last Night
programme.desc: David Mamet's play +Sexual Perversity in Chicago was adapted for the big screen by fellow Chicago citizen Tim Kazurinsky and became About Last Night... programme.title: Thunderball
programme.desc: British secret agent James Bond is dispatched to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by international terrorist organisation SPECTRE. Action(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: An ageless monk guards a sacred scroll that can grant its readers the power to rule the world. With the help of a cocky pickpocket, the monk battles a Nazi who's trying to seize control of the artifact(n)

programme.title: Mad Max
programme.desc: Futuristic action drama in which highway cops battle predatory motorcyclists(n)

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Adaptation of Tom Clancy's novel, with ex-CIA agent Jack Ryan and his family the targets of a terrorist(n)

programme.title: My Darling Clementine
programme.desc: John Ford's western takes its inspiration from the life and legend of Wyatt Earp (Henry Fonda), the frontier lawman who teamed with Doc Holliday (Victor Mature) for the famous gunfight at the O.K. Corral(n)

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Johnny, who has just been released from prison and gets a job in a café beside waitress Frankie. Frankie is a loner but Johnny is determined that their romance will blossom(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A woman realizes that friends can be lovers, but now has to convince the friend in question in this romantic comedy. Michael O'Neal (Dermot Mulroney) and Julianne Potter (Julia Roberts) were romantically involved in college, and after breaking up, they have managed to remain close friends. For years, Julianne and Michael have had a pledge that if both were single when they turned 28, they would get married. Shortly before her 28th birthday, Julianne is lamenting the sad state of her love life when she gets a call from Michael, who announces that he has important news. Julianne is convinced that Michael is going to ask her to marry him, and she is crestfallen when he announces that he's engaged to Kimmy Wallace (Cameron Diaz). Kimmy seems like the perfect woman for Michael; she's sweet, pretty, bright, and adores Michael, and her wealthy family is just as fond of him as she is. But now that Julianne has realized how much she loves Michael, she's not about to give him up without a fight -- and isn't afraid to fight dirty. Julianne's uneasy ally in the battle for Michael's affections is her friend and editor George Downes (Rupert Everett), a cheerfully out-of-the-closet homosexual who is not prepared when Julianne asks him to pose as her boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Thunderball
programme.desc: British secret agent James Bond is dispatched to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by international terrorist organisation SPECTRE. Action(n)

programme.title: Mad Max
programme.desc: Futuristic action drama in which highway cops battle predatory motorcyclists(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: Shelley is living a carefree life until a rival gets her tossed out of the Playboy Mansion. With nowhere to go, fate delivers her to the sorority girls from Zeta Alpha Zeta. Unless they can sign a new pledge class, the seven socially clueless women will lose their house to the scheming girls of Phi Iota Mu. In order to accomplish their goal, they need Shelley to teach them the ways of makeup and men at the same time, Shelley needs some of what the Zetas have: a sense of individuality. The combination leads all the girls to learn how to stop pretending and start being themselves(n)

programme.title: The Living Daylights
programme.desc: In this instalment of the James Bond series, Agent 007 is assigned to protect a Russian defector from the KGB. When the defection proves to be an elaborate ploy, Bond woos her anyway, and together they follow a trail to a crooked American arms dealer supplying weapons to Afghanistan(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A woman realizes that friends can be lovers, but now has to convince the friend in question in this romantic comedy. Michael O'Neal (Dermot Mulroney) and Julianne Potter (Julia Roberts) were romantically involved in college, and after breaking up, they have managed to remain close friends. For years, Julianne and Michael have had a pledge that if both were single when they turned 28, they would get married. Shortly before her 28th birthday, Julianne is lamenting the sad state of her love life when she gets a call from Michael, who announces that he has important news. programme.title: Gang Related
programme.desc: Two corrupt cops organise illicit deals involving impounded drugs, but make the mistake of singling out an undercover agent as their next victim(n)

programme.title: Rushlights
programme.desc: Two unscrupulous teenagers travel to Texas to steal a deceased friend's inheritance, and get caught up in a dangerous web of deception and murder(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank takes a job driving the young son of Miami's anti- drugs tsar. Florida was supposed to be a holiday, but when Colombian killers kidnap the boy and frame Frank, he has to start taking life seriously one more. Martial arts action(n)

programme.title: The Towering Inferno
programme.desc: Doug Roberts, Architect, returns from a long vacation to find work nearly completed on his skyscraper. But a fire breaks out in the building and the fire department must fight to save it(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: An enormous great white shark terrorises a summer resort town, where a police chief, a grizzled fisherman and an intrepid marine biologist realise they're "gonna need a bigger boat" to battle the bloodthirsty beast. An Oscar winner for sound, editing and John Williams's score(n)

programme.title: Gunmen
programme.desc: This film opens with a big fat close-up of a sweaty prisoner with a fly (on a string) crawling on his face. The prisoner quickly pops the fly in his mouth and spits it out. Then he leeringly laughs about it to the prisoner next door. Nope. This is not a bad undiscovered Sergio Leone spaghetti western. Rather it is the opening shot Deran Sarafin's Gunmen -- a brainless action film without an original thought in its head. Christopher Lambert is the fly-eater, a man named Dani Servigo, the brother of a dead smuggler and a prisoner in a South American jail, who holds the secret to the whereabouts of $400,000 in stolen drug money. The walls of the prison explode, and Cole Parker (Mario Van Pebbles) makes his entrance. Cole is a mercenary working with the DEA who is in this South American hellhole to mop up the drug traders and to avenge his father's death at the hands of the drug traders. He wants Dani to lead him to the gold. In this love-hate buddy film, the two thrown-together friends/enemies race through the Amazon jungle with ruthless assassins in pursuit, as they all gravitate towards the secret stash of money(n)

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: A young cop is assigned to the precinct in Queens where he grew up, and he finds his life threatened when he investigates a police cover-up involving the unsolved murders of two boys(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: This sequel to Speed sees Sandra Bullock back and Jan de Be Bont directing but with Jason Patric taking over the Keanu Reeves role. The pair are an item and decide on a romantic cruise to the Caribbean. Unfortunately, also aboard the cruise liner are a gathering of diamond merchants, complete with their wares and arch-villain Willem Defoe, who plans to steal their merchandise. Unlike the original Speed, where the trick was that the bus would explode if it slowed down, this time, speed is of the essence - the plan is to ram the ship into dry land and, in the mayhem, escape with the loot. Bullock and Patric are perfect as the dynamic duo who save the day and the ocean-going scenario allows for more spectacular special effects than the original(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Two siblings find themselves competing on and off the racetrack in this action-packed drama. K.C. Carlyle (Steve Howey) and his kid brother, Trip (Mike Vogel), are both racers in the rough and tumble world of supercross, a revved-up variation on motocross racing in which specially modified motorcycle negotiate specially built dirt tracks that send riders through tricky twists and turns, over rough terrain, and off high-flying jumps. Both are talented racers, but K.C. has a wilder and more reckless approach, while Trip follows a more cautious path. A more profound difference between them arises when K.C. is offered a lucrative deal to ride for a factory-sponsored team; he takes the deal, and leaves his brother behind to race on his own dime. However, when an accident takes Trip out of the running on the supercross circuit, he and K.C. set aside their differences as Trip helps coach his older brother so he can succeed in his drive to the championship. Made with the cooperation of a leading supercross race promoter, Supercross: The Movie also stars Sophia Bush and Cameron Richardson as the brothers' love interests, and Robert Carradine as a determined race coach(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo is reunited with his old flame, Jeanne Benoit, when insurgents in Sudan attack a group of volunteer doctors, including her husband. Travelling to the crime scene to conduct a joint murder-kidnapping investigation, Dinozzi and McGee offer their assistance in searching for the missing doctors. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly and Sean Murray, with Scottie Thompson.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Kyle Friedgen is accused of killing his ex-girlfriend, but while his case is dismissed due to a mishandled warrant, his life and reputation are marred by suspicion that he got away with murder. Determined to clear his name in full, Friedgen volunteers to be court-martialled, on the condition that the NCIS team conducts its own investigation. Meanwhile, Bishop and Jake discuss their marital problems. Naval crime drama, starring Emily Wickersham, with Jamie Bamber.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The two Marine brothers of a sailor battling leukaemia are killed in the line of duty, and to spare the servicemen's family further grief, the secretary of the US Navy seeks the NCIS team's help in locating a suitable bone marrow donor. Meanwhile, Bishop returns home to Oklahoma for Thanksgiving. Military crime drama, starring Emily Wickersham.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ducky is assaulted by a man who claims to have previously undisclosed information about his half-brother, who died decades ago. While his NCIS colleagues traces the attacker's whereabouts, Dr Mallard recalls the emotional final days he spent with his sibling. Elsewhere, as the holiday season approaches, Bishop and Jake discuss the future of their relationship. Naval crime drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The first instalment of a two-part crossover with NCIS: New Orleans sees the Washington, DC team co-operating with their colleagues from the Big Easy to investigate a spate of lethal poisonings on board a New Orleans-to-DC flight. All the evidence seems to point to missing chef Luca, who happens to be Abby's brother, so the two investigative services join forces to locate him, and find out why a private tech firm seems to have been targetted by the killer. Naval crime drama, guest starring Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Torres discovers a witness in an NCIS case is wanted by US Immigration and Customs Enforcement, while Abby, Bishop and McGee hope to sublet Tony's apartment - by wooing his father.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ellie is sent to Gitmo to gather evidence in the case relating to the murder of a US Navy chaplain, and while there, she is given cause to question her previous work at the NSA.(n)

programme.desc: A known sex offender is suspected of raping several women and murdering one in her home. His lawyer proves to be a match for Brenda, putting the team at risk of losing the case. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda's plans to organise her wedding are put on hold when a phone containing text messages pointing to a possible murder is found. Fritz's sister Claire, who fancies herself as a psychic, tags along and tries to help with the investigation. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: As Brenda and Fritz's wedding day approaches, one is preoccupied with a murder case and the other with the search for a drug lord. Starring Kyra Sedgwick and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: As Brenda and the team investigate the quadruple murder of a family, they find themselves in the middle of an FBI case that could have a connection to the victims. Meanwhile, Provenza's good mood takes a turn for the worse. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and GW Bailey.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A rich businessman being investigated for investment fraud is allegedly kidnapped, but Brenda and the team suspect he may have staged his own abduction. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.desc: Roger realises he has a crush on Hayley while Jeff is away, and Stan decides to sell his SUV himself rather than trade it in for lower than his asking price. Comedy about a man who works for the CIA.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan goes on holiday, but while he is away Bullock gives him an assignment. Elsewhere, Hayley and Jeff try to rekindle their sex life, Roger poses as an elderly female widow and Steve goes on a mission to find nudity.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Life and Times of Stan Smith.
programme.desc: Stan becomes addicted to `dying' after Roger tricks him into thinking he has had a heart attack. Meanwhile, Klaus takes Steve to Arizona State University for a college visit.(n)

programme.sub-title: The New Adventures of Old Tom.

programme.sub-title: Stewie, Chris and Brian's Excellent Adventure.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie impregnates himself with Brian's DNA to save their friendship, while Peter and the guys try to make a viral video.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan finds out his half-brother Rusty (guest voice Lou Diamond Phillips) is wealthier than him when the family gathers for Thanksgiving, and takes extreme measures to recover what he thinks is rightfully his.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is awaiting his annual jury summons, but there is trouble ahead when becomes the foreman in a trial where Roger is the defendant. Meanwhile, Jeff and Hayley move in with the Smiths, and Francine tries to get Jeff to clean up his act.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Nobody seems to care when Brian accidentally runs over and kills a fellow dog, so he tries to convince his friends that they should value canine lives as much as those of humans. Meanwhile, Lois hires a maid who does not listen to Peter.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Carter has a heart attack and lapses into a deep coma, so Peter takes over the running of his company Pewterschmidt Industries, but becomes power-mad and ends up firing every member of the board of directors.(n)

programme.sub-title: For Whom the Sleigh Bell Tolls.
programme.desc: Against Francine's advice, Stan decides to give Steve a gun for Christmas, but when the teenager accidentally shoots Santa dead, the whole festive season is under threat.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The Smiths are forced to move into a hotel following an incident in which Roger released lethal gas into their home. However, Francine soon becomes bored with her new surroundings and decides to assume the identity of a businesswoman.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter hits his head and develops total amnesia, leaving Lois facing the task of reacquainting him with his friends and family - not to mention such skills as driving and having sex.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian is hired by a magazine and decides to follow Meg for research, but discovers she has a secret boyfriend who has broken out of jail and is hiding in the Griffins' house. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein and Mila Kunis.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan and Francine's social life gets a boost when they meet adventurous couple Tom and Cami, but they realise they cannot keep up with them. However, it isn't long before they devise a plan to slow them down permanently.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger invites Stan to attend one of his acting classes, but tempers flare when they both audition for the same role. Meanwhile, Steve and his friends plan to say goodbye to their childhoods by arranging the greatest sleepover ever.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The concluding instalment of a two-part crossover with the original NCIS series sees Sebastian joining Abby Sciuto in Washington, DC to pick through the forensic evidence relating to the aircraft murders. Meanwhile, DC agent Ellie Bishop heads to New Orleans to help Pride and his team track down the chief suspect - Abby's brother Luca. Naval crime drama, guest starring Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects foul play when a seaman who was set to testify before a grand jury dies before he can make his court appearance. When it becomes clear the man was murdered, the subsequent investigation reveals that a previously thwarted human-trafficking ring has been re-established. Meanwhile, a storm causes a massive power outage, and McGee seeks a room for the night among his colleagues. Naval crime drama, starring Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A deep-sea diver is murdered on the job, and his co-workers all become suspects. However, when they return to the surface, they must remain in a high-tech decompression chamber for four days. With each of their suspects confined within a tank, the NCIS team must complete an unorthodox investigation from the outside. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Sarah Porter, the Secretary of the Navy, learns her daughter has been kidnapped, and the NCIS crew teams up with the FBI to track the case, determine a motive and bring the abducted girl home. Meanwhile, McGee's childhood friend, NCIS Special Agent Valerie Page, arrives in town to assist with advanced tactics training. Naval crime drama, guest starring Leslie Hope and Christina Chang.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team looks into a raid on a naval base, and Dr Cyril Taft - the surgeon who saved Gibbs' life - experiences the thrill of assisting on an investigation. Assigned to treat Gibbs' suspect, Taft manages to uncover evidence that may prove crucial to solving the case. Meanwhile, DiNozzo pays his old flame Jeanne Benoit a visit as he chases a lead involving doctors in Sudan. Guest starring John Cryer and Scottie Thompson.(n)

programme.desc: Brenda and her team investigate the death of an internet dating legend and find appearances are deceptive when a new officer shows up, while Pope tries to integrate himself into the squad.(n)
