programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Married explorers Rick and Evelyn battle the newly resurrected mummy Imhotep and his ruthless partner, who have captured their son. The undead creature is heading for a confrontation with a legendary ancient warrior - with power over a magical army to be won. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo, Oded Fehr and Patricia Velasquez, with a brief appearance by Dwayne Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster.(n)

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: The bungling Inspector Clouseau is sent to investigate a high-profile murder case. All the clues point to a maid being the guilty party, but the accident-prone detective is instantly smitten with her, and devotes his efforts to proving her innocence - despite all evidence to the contrary. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers, Elke Sommer, George Sanders and Herbert Lom.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver.(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. As survivors try to flee the seemingly unstoppable alien invaders, the courageous US president, an ace pilot and a computer genius come up with a plan to take the fight to the enemy and save the human race. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr.(n)

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Account of the life of medieval Scottish hero William Wallace. After the slaughter of his father and brother, young Wallace is taken in by his uncle, who teaches him how to use not only his brawn but his brain - which he employs to great effect years later when he resolves to drive the English out of Scotland. Oscar-winning historical epic, directed by and starring Mel Gibson. With Patrick McGoohan, Sophie Marceau and Catherine McCormack.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. As survivors try to flee the seemingly unstoppable alien invaders, the courageous US president, an ace pilot and a computer genius come up with a plan to take the fight to the enemy and save the human race. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr.(n)

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: A talented martial arts expert gets entangled with a tenacious undercover reporter as he takes part in an illegal fighting tournament, where the last man standing wins the day - and the losers usually end up in the cemetery. Action adventure, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Donald Gibb, Leah Ayres, Norman Burton and Roy Chiao.(n)

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.(n)

programme.title: Dark Places
programme.desc: A seven-year-old girl witnesses the murder of her mother and sisters, and testifies that her teenage brother was the killer, leading to his imprisonment. As an adult, she attends a gathering of true-crime fans, and discovers they all think her brother was innocent. She reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime, and begins to realise her memories may not be as reliable as she thought. Mystery, starring Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult, Christina Hendricks and Chloe Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Premiere. Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan.(n)

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster.(n)

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A respected academic goes on the run when he is framed for the murder of a French historian. Pursued by the detective on the case and a sinister assassin monk, he strives to unmask the culprit, leading to a conspiracy determined to preserve a 2,000-year-old secret at any cost. Thriller based on Dan Brown's novel, starring Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Paul Bettany and Jean Reno.(n)

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.(n)

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Premiere. Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan.(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A disillusioned man learns his father was a member of a secret society of superpowered assassins dedicated to eliminating people who are destined to commit acts of evil in the future. Having inherited his father's special abilities, he is recruited into the organisation and must take on a former member who has betrayed it. Action adventure, starring James McAvoy, Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman.(n)

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Victorian stage illusionists Robert Angier and Alfred Borden engage in a bitter personal and professional rivalry. The pair resort to increasingly brutal measures to sabotage each other's acts, while Angier becomes obsessed with the secret behind Borden's greatest illusion. Christopher Nolan's mystery thriller, starring Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo and Scarlett Johansson, with David Bowie as real-life scientific pioneer Nikola Tesla.(n)

programme.title: The Neighbour
programme.desc: When a Mississippi man comes home to find his girlfriend missing, he soon discovers the disturbing truth about his secretive neighbour. Horror thriller, starring Josh Stewart, Bill Engvall and Alex Essoe.(n)

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.(n)

programme.title: Mojave
programme.desc: A suicidal artist drives into the desert seeking solitude, hoping to find some meaning in his shallow life. He meets a mysterious drifter who throws his life off course, and must find a way to conquer his depression in order to protect the things he cares about. Thriller, starring Oscar Isaac, Garrett Hedlund and Mark Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: Lost In The Sun
programme.desc: A small-time crook finds an unlikely partner in crime in a newly orphaned teenager. Texas-set action thriller, starring Josh Duhamel, Josh Wiggins and Lynn Collins.(n)

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A stranded motorist is desperate when his wife disappears without a trace on a road trip - and the reluctance of the locals to help convinces him something sinister is going on. When it turns out that she has been abducted by a crazed trucker and his cronies, he is determined to set her free and make sure the villains pay for their crime. Thriller, starring Kurt Russell, Kathleen Quinlan, JT Walsh, MC Gainey, Jack Noseworthy and Rex Linn.(n)

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: A petty crook finds himself in a tricky situation when he tries to smuggle an antique gun from Mexico into America for his Mob boss. As events begin to spiral out of control, his girlfriend's displeasure and a pursuing hitman only add to the would-be bootlegger's woes. Comedy thriller directed by Gore Verbinski, with Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, James Gandolfini, Gene Hackman and JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: Desierto
programme.desc: A group of immigrants hoping to make it across the US-Mexico border are targeted by a deranged, gun-wielding vigilante. Thriller, starring Gael Garcia Bernal and Jeffrey Dean Morgan.(n)

programme.title: The Hollow Point
programme.desc: A hard-drinking sheriff and his deputy are pitted against a sadistic cartel hitman. Crime thriller, starring Patrick Wilson, Ian McShane and John Leguizamo.(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: A Texan hunter who took a stash of money abandoned at the site of a botched drug deal is pursued across the state by an implacable hitman with no qualms about killing anyone who gets in his way. Meanwhile, a world-weary sheriff struggles to make sense of the escalating chain of violence. The Coen brothers' Oscar-winning crime thriller, starring Josh Brolin, Javier Bardem, Tommy Lee Jones, Kelly Macdonald and Woody Harrelson.(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: Premiere. A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook.(n)

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon
programme.desc: A gold prospector buys a wife from a Mormon and agrees to share her with his mining partner when she insists they all live together. Mindful that her presence in an all-male town might give rise to jealousy, he hijacks a stagecoach carrying six working girls and opens a brothel in town. Oscar-nominated musical Western, starring Lee Marvin, Clint Eastwood, with Jean Seberg and Harve Presnell.(n)

programme.title: Flirting With Love
programme.desc: Premiere. Constant distractions hamper a pair of struggling New York actors who retreat to the country to work on a script. Comedy, starring Marisa Tomei, Sam Rockwell and Ivan Martin.(n)

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: A washed-up pop idol is given the chance to write a song for a teenage star - but despite his musical talents, he has never written a lyric in his life. However, the discovery that the woman who looks after his plants has a way with words marks the start of a beautiful relationship. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Drew Barrymore, Brad Garret and Kristen Johnston.(n)

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: A thirtysomething man has no intention of leaving the family home, so his exasperated parents respond by hiring a woman who earns her living enticing stay-at-home men to fall in love with her and then encouraging them to fly the nest. Romantic comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Matthew McConaughey, Kathy Bates and Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A food critic realises she is in love with her best friend just as he announces he is going to marry another woman. Determined to have him to herself, she heads for the wedding with the intention of sabotaging the ceremony - but persuading the groom to give up on his bride-to-be proves harder than expected. Romantic comedy, starring Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney, Cameron Diaz and Rupert Everett.(n)

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.(n)

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: A professional relationship guru, who specialises in offering advice to lonely single men, helps an unlucky-in-love accountant to woo the girl of his dreams. However, when he finds himself falling for a beautiful gossip columnist, his usual charm abandons him and he discovers his expertise counts for nothing. Romantic comedy, with Will Smith, Eva Mendes, Kevin James, Amber Valletta, Julie Ann Emery, Adam Arkin and Michael Rapaport.(n)

programme.title: The Dressmaker
programme.desc: An Australian fashion designer returns to her remote home town in the 1950s after forging a successful career in Paris. She reconciles with her mother, falls in love and transforms the lives of the local women - getting even with her enemies in the process. Drama based on the novel by Rosalie Ham, starring Kate Winslet, Judy Davis, Hugo Weaving and Liam Hemsworth.(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: A widowed mother moves from New York City to Los Angeles to be with her daughter, but her well-meaning, meddlesome ways drive her offspring up the wall. Comedy-drama, starring Susan Sarandon, Rose Byrne and JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: An American writer and his wife arrive in a picturesque French seaside town in France, their marriage in the middle of a crisis. They form friendships with locals and fellow visitors, while trying to repair the cracks in their relationship. Drama, directed by and starring Angelina Jolie, with Brad Pitt and Melanie Laurent.(n)

programme.title: Reckless
programme.desc: A married federal prosecutor stands poised on the brink of a bright future in politics. Everything starts to unravel when he hires an escort for the night. The experience ignites an uncontrollable sex addiction, and as his career blossoms, he faces a constant challenge hiding his actions from the media and his ambitious wife. Drama, starring Patrick Wilson, Lena Headey, Ray Winstone and Richard Dreyfuss.(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: A doomed love affair between two Wyoming cowboys develops over the course of 20 years. The relationship begins when they are hired to herd sheep on a remote mountain in the 1960s, and though they go their separate ways and try to settle down to married life, they are unable to overcome their desire for each other and continue to meet in secret. Ang Lee's drama, starring Heath Ledger, Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Williams and Anne Hathaway.(n)

programme.title: The Prince and the Showgirl
programme.desc: A European prince visiting London for the coronation of George V becomes fascinated by an American showgirl, who then falls in love with him. When she discovers his estranged son is embroiled in a treasonous plot to overthrow his father, she comes up with a solution to stop the intrigue and reunite the pair. Romantic comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe and Laurence Olivier, who also directed. With Sybil Thorndike and Richard Wattis.(n)

programme.title: Spaceman
programme.desc: Premiere. Biopic of baseball player Bill `Spaceman' Lee, whose maverick ways cause problems with the Montreal Expos. Starring Josh Duhamel, Ernie Hudson and W Earl Brown.(n)

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: A lawyer catches the attention of a real-estate tycoon, who offers her a job. However, she quickly tires of running the self-absorbed millionaire's life for him and quits - forcing him to pull out all the stops to win her back. Romantic comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Hugh Grant, Alicia Witt and Dana Ivey.(n)

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: Two students at Harvard University fall in love, but their romance is fated to be cut tragically short by the discovery that one of them has a terminal illness. Romantic drama, starring Ali MacGraw, Ryan O'Neal and Ray Milland.(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: A French acrobat hatches an audacious scheme to carry out his most spectacular performance in 1974. With the aid of his circus mentor and an international team of helpers, he plans to tightrope walk between the towers of the World Trade Centre. Fact-based drama, starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett.(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtis's romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: Miracles From Heaven
programme.desc: A sick young girl with a rare illness finds herself cured after surviving a terrible accident. Drama, starring Jennifer Garner, Kylie Rogers and Martin Henderson.(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett.(n)

Richard Curtis's romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement.(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tale of Two Kitties
programme.desc: The lazy moggy stows away in his owner's luggage and ends up in London. He is promptly mistaken for an English upper-class cat, who has recently inherited a grand estate, and moves into his stately home - much to the dismay of the real aristocratic feline's conniving relation, who is bent on swindling him out of his money. Family comedy, starring Breckin Meyer, Billy Connolly and Jennifer Love Hewitt, with the voices of Bill Murray and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A fairy living in an enchanted forest tries to rescue her sister from a monstrous creature. Meanwhile, the magical kingdom is thrown into chaos by a love potion, that results in a series of unexpected romances. Animated fantasy musical, with the voices of Evan Rachel Wood, Alan Cumming and Kristin Chenoweth.(n)

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians Of The Golden Egg
programme.desc: When the Easter rabbit school comes under threat from a family of foxes plotting to steal the legendary golden egg, it's up to young Max to save the day. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Noah Levi and Senta Berger.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart.(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis.(n)

programme.title: Cars 3: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at Pixar's latest animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson and Armie Hammer.(n)

Family comedy, starring Breckin Meyer, Billy Connolly and Jennifer Love Hewitt, with the voices of Bill Murray and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
programme.desc: A youngster is forced to stage his own death to escape his cruel father, and embarks on a series of adventures accompanied by a runaway slave in 19th-century Mississippi. Disney adaptation of Mark Twain's classic tale, starring Elijah Wood, Courtney B Vance, Robbie Coltrane, Jason Robards, Dana Ivey, Anne Heche and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.(n)

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: A teenager with a promising academic future causes consternation for her family when she sets her sights on becoming a professional ice skater. Luckily, a former champion of the sport is on hand to offer training and advice. Comedy drama, starring Michelle Trachtenberg, Kim Cattrall, Joan Cusack and Hayden Panettiere, alongside a host of professional skaters.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
programme.desc: A youngster is forced to stage his own death to escape his cruel father, and embarks on a series of adventures accompanied by a runaway slave in 19th-century Mississippi. Disney adaptation of Mark Twain's classic tale, starring Elijah Wood, Courtney B Vance, Robbie Coltrane, Jason Robards, Dana Ivey, Anne Heche and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha.(n)

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy.(n)

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A teenager discovers his new neighbour is the writer of a popular series of books, who harbours a terrifying secret. The ghosts and monsters the author writes about are real, and his stories keep them contained. The youngster accidentally releases them into the real world, and has to find a way to get them back in the books before they can cause chaos. Fantasy adventure, starring Jack Black and Dylan Minnette.(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: The singing rodents mistakenly come to the conclusion that their human friend Dave intends to get rid of them when he proposes to his girlfriend in Miami. With only three days until Dave pops the question, the trio embark on a desperate road trip across America to sabotage his romantic plans. Family comedy sequel, starring Jason Lee and Kimberly Williams-Paisley.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: The pig and his farmyard pals take a trip to the big city, where their curiosity and love of adventure lands them in trouble, leaving the courageous Babe to find a way to save his chums from danger. Family comedy sequel, starring Magda Szubanski, Mickey Rooney and James Cromwell, and featuring the voice of Elizabeth Daily as Babe.(n)

programme.title: Alleycats
programme.desc: Premiere. A bicycle courier believes he has witnessed a murder, and flees for his life. However, he resolves later to uncover the truth of what he saw and investigates further, leading him into a dangerous world of political corruption and illegal bike racing. Action thriller, starring Josh Whitehouse, Eleanor Tomlinson and John Hannah.(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Premiere. Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown.(n)

programme.desc: Premiere. During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger.(n)

programme.title: Super Furry Animals
programme.desc: Premiere. Chaos erupts when a cowardly critter uses an untested scientific contraption and accidentally swaps bodies with a caterpillar. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Vinnie Penna, Peter Linz, Mike Pollock and Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld.(n)

programme.desc: A reporter investigates the story of a man trying to build a haunted house out of rooms where terrible things have happened. Horror from Saw veteran Darren Lynn Bousman, starring Joe Anderson, Jessica Lowndes and Lin Shaye.(n)

programme.title: Racing Hearts
programme.desc: Premiere. A businessman travels to a small Belgian village on an unusual assignment. As the visitor tries to persuade the breeder to part with the creature, he falls for the man's granddaughter. Romantic drama, with Jamie Dornan, Charlotte De Bruyne and Anthony Head.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon

Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London.(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A child who grows up in slavery becomes a formidable warrior and a cunning thief. Taken prisoner by a victorious king, he is sent out to destroy the leader of the barbaric cult that destroyed his village and slaughtered his family. Fantasy adventure, based on the stories by author Robert E Howard, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Max von Sydow, James Earl Jones and Sandahl Bergman.(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Premiere. A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2

programme.title: The Greasy Strangler
programme.desc: A tour guide competes with his son for the love of a woman as a murderer terrorises their neighbourhood. Comedy horror, starring Michael St Michaels and Sky Elobar.(n)

programme.title: All Hallows' Eve
programme.desc: A teenager looking after two children at Halloween discovers an old video tape in their trick or treat bag. She plays it and discovers it contains recordings of horrific incidents involving a sinister clown - but does not realise that by watching the films she is summoning him into being. Horror anthology, starring Katie Maguire and Mike Giannelli.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the sci-fi action sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Three eccentric scientists put their hi-tech gadgetry and knowledge of the paranormal to money-making use by setting up in business as freelance ghost catchers. A musician calls them in to investigate when she sees strange creatures in her kitchen, only to end up possessed. As the spook-hunting team members deal with an attempt to shut their operation down, they discover an evil demonic entity is being summoned into existence and it falls to them to stop this creature from destroying the world. Supernatural comedy adventure, starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Sigourney Weaver, Ernie Hudson and Rick Moranis.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: The Witch
programme.desc: An English farmer is driven from his land in 17th-century America, and settles on the edge of a sinister forest. The family suffers a series of inexplicable disasters, and as tension rises between them, the eldest daughter finds herself accused by her own parents and siblings of being a witch. Period horror, starring Anya Taylor-Joy and Ralph Ineson.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: The war between the shape-shifting robots erupts once again, as the first of the evil Decepticons leads an attack on Earth to locate an ancient planet-destroying machine. Hapless teenager Sam Witwicky is caught in the middle of the ensuing conflict as he holds the key to discovering the location of the device. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox.(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Writer-director Tyler Perry's fourth film is an uproarious, insightful comedy about a hard-luck single mom (Angela Bassett) from Chicago who attends her long-estranged father's funeral in rural Georgia and meets a clan of offbeat relatives she didn't know she had. Former NBA star Rick Fox costars as a college hoops coach who is romantically interested in Bassett. Perry costars as Joe and has a cameo as his recurring character, the larger-than-life matriarch, Madea(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: A woman has to learn how to love and trust men all over again in this comedy drama. Helen McCarter (Kimberly Elise) would seem to have it all -- she's been married for 18 years to Charles (Steve Harris), and over the course of their time together, he's become one of Atlanta's most successful attorneys. But despite wealth and prestige, things are not as they should be at the McCarter home, and on their anniversary, Charles drops a bombshell on Helen -- he's divorcing her for another woman. Escorted out of the house with nowhere to go, Helen moves in with her grandmother Madea (Tyler Perry), a sassy woman with no shortage of opinions and a gun that she's not afraid to use. As Madea helps Helen get back on her feet emotionally, the divorcée makes the acquaintance of Orlando (Shemar Moore), a handsome man who is obviously attracted to her. But after her experiences with Charles, Helen isn't sure if she's ready to trust a man again. Diary of a Mad Black Woman was adapted from the popular stage play by Tyler Perry, who also plays several roles in the film, most prominently Madea; it marked the first feature-film credit for successful music video director Darren R. Grant(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: This star-studded ensemble comedy tells a series of interlocking stories about motherhood. A divorced mother of two (Jennifer Aniston) falls for a guy with two kids of his own (Jason Sudeikis), a young woman (Britt Robertson) tries to find her biological mom (Julia Roberts), and an overstressed mother (Kate Hudson) is visited by her bickering parents. Mother's Day is the latest holiday-centric movie directed by Garry Marshall, who previously helmed Valentine's Day and New Year's Eve(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Three overstrained, overworked mums plan a holiday and decides to blow off their responsibilities. But their wild ways creates a clash with a rival mummy, who's committed to preserving the facade of her perfect life(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Writer-director Tyler Perry's fourth film is an uproarious, insightful comedy about a hard-luck single mom (Angela Bassett) from Chicago who attends her long-estranged father's funeral in rural Georgia and meets a clan of offbeat relatives she didn't know she had. Former NBA star Rick Fox costars as a college hoops coach who is romantically interested in Bassett. Perry costars as Joe and has a cameo as his recurring character, the larger-than-life matriarch, Madea(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: A woman has to learn how to love and trust men all over again in this comedy drama. Helen McCarter (Kimberly Elise) would seem to have it all -- she's been married for 18 years to Charles (Steve Harris), and over the course of their time together, he's become one of Atlanta's most successful attorneys. But despite wealth and prestige, things are not as they should be at the McCarter home, and on their anniversary, Charles drops a bombshell on Helen -- he's divorcing her for another woman. Escorted out of the house with nowhere to go, Helen moves in with her grandmother Madea (Tyler Perry), a sassy woman with no shortage of opinions and a gun that she's not afraid to use. As Madea helps Helen get back on her feet emotionally, the divorcée makes the acquaintance of Orlando (Shemar Moore), a handsome man who is obviously attracted to her. But after her experiences with Charles, Helen isn't sure if she's ready to trust a man again. Diary of a Mad Black Woman was adapted from the popular stage play by Tyler Perry, who also plays several roles in the film, most prominently Madea; it marked the first feature-film credit for successful music video director Darren R. Grant(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: This star-studded ensemble comedy tells a series of interlocking stories about motherhood. Mother's Day is the latest holiday-centric movie directed by Garry Marshall, who previously helmed Valentine's Day and New Year's Eve(n)

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: Science fiction epic concerning the battle for control of the planet Dune. Two royal houses fight to rule the desert world, which produces the valuable spice that makes space travel possible. The young son of a duke arrives on Dune with his royal parents, but when the evil Harkonnens attack, he flees into the desert. There he discovers mystical powers that will enable him to fulfil his destiny as liberator of Dune and its people(n)

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: Suspense yarn about a youth (Bruce Davison) who trains rats to follow his bidding. Martin: Ernest Borgnine. Henrietta: Elsa Lanchester. Joan: Sondra Locke. Brandt: Michael Dante. Alice: Joan Shawlee. Barskin: William Hansen. Charlotte: Jody Gilbert. Daniel Mann directed(n)

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman acts as a nanny for a life-size doll, which a couple are using as a coping mechanism for the death of their son two decades earlier. However, she soon suspects that there is more to the doll than meets the eye(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: Two siblings search for their missing parents after they discover they're descendants of a group of protectors who safeguard special objects, such as a fairytale mirror their parents were looking for when they vanished(n)

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller set at the end of WWII about a devoutly religious mother who moves to a Jersey mansion with her ailing children to await the return of her soldier husband. Soon, a series of strange and chilling events prompts the newcomers to believe that the house is haunted(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Featuring sly tributes to horror fantasies of the past and infused with gallows humor, Sam Raimi's final entry in the Evil Dead trilogy features the largest budget and most lavish special effects. Once again the story centers on the attempts of Ash, a modern Yankee to escape the dark, mystical confines of medieval England where he found himself after suffering a car accident. This and his subsequent adventures are explained in the film's prologue. According to his friend Wiseman, Ash cannot return home until he can retrieve the Necronomicon, a book that contains the spell necessary to raise the dead or vanquish existing zombies. The book is located in a magical graveyard. Ash is heading there when the demonic entities who bedeviled him in the previous installments pursue him to a malevolent windmill. There a mirror shatters and Ash finds himself surrounded by a legion of tiny clones of himself. One of the ornery dopplegangers crawls into his mouth and transforms into his wicked twin. A battle begins and the Good Ash triumphs. Eventually, he makes it to the graveyard. In order to get the book, Ash must correctly recite a memorized spell. Unfortunately, he has forgotten a few key words and in saying it causes a legion of corpses to rise from the graves. This hellish army is led by his own dead double and that is when all the gooey, gory fun really begins(n)

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: A recently resurrected soldier named Henry must rescue his wife from a ruthless criminal gang that want to get their hands on the technology embedded in his body. This action movie takes place entirely from a first-person perspective(n)

programme.title: Code 46
programme.desc: In the not-so-distant future, a married man investigates a counterfeiter and ends up the perpetrator of an ethical crime in Code 46, the latest film from prolific British director Michael Winterbottom. Set against the backdrop of a technologically advanced Shanghai, where people are only allowed to travel between countries with official passports called "papelles," the film charts the efforts of Seattle native William (Tim Robbins) to get to the bottom of a contraband-papelle operation within the walls of a high-tech company that manufactures them. There he finds Maria (Samantha Morton), an enigmatic young woman who may or may not be selling the passports on the black market. William has a brief affair with Maria, which, despite his attempts to return home, causes him to become embroiled in an even bigger controversy in Shanghai(n)

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: In this unrelentingly gory shocker, a novice policewoman (Pollyanna McIntosh) must contend with a deranged stranger (Liam Cunningham) whose presence on the night shift opens up a paranormal world of terror for everyone in the station(n)

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two teenage geeks (Anthony Michael Hall and Ilan Mitchell-Smith) create the perfect woman (Kelly Le Brock) with their computer in John Hughes' Weird Science. programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Jason is an American teenager obsessed with Hong Kong cinema and kung-fu classics. One day, he makes an extraordinary discovery in a Chinatown pawnshop -- he finds the legendary fighting stick of Chinese sage and warrior The Monkey King. With the stick in his hands, he is suddenly transported back to ancient China, where he joins an army of fierce warriors. Together, they'll embark in a dangerous quest to free the imprisoned king. Martial arts stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li come together onscreen for the first time ever(n)

Jess Weixler, Jennifer Prediger, Megan Mullally, Will Forte and Jeffrey Tambor co-star(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A former Los Angeles DA inspector (Chiwetel Ejiofor) spends 13 years hunting the killer who raped and murdered the teen daughter of his colleague (Julia Roberts). But when he finds the culprit and the district attorney (Nicole Kidman) refuses to reopen the case, he is forced to pursue justice on his own, which ultimately leads to a shocking discovery. This English-language remake of Juan José Campanella's 2009 Argentinian film of the same name was written and directed by Billy Ray(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Bill Condon's thriller The Fifth Estate charts the creation of WikiLeaks by the ambitious and arguably ethically dubious Julian Assange, played by Benedict Cumberbatch. The movie opens with Assange hiring Daniel Domscheit-Berg (Daniel Brühl), a fellow tech whiz, to help him keep his new website operational. The site gave whistleblowers an entirely anonymous platform to share classified documents, and soon the pair find themselves in possession of information that will bring down a corrupt bank. As their power and influence grows, they must consider teaming with established media sources, especially when they are sent documents that would reveal ultra-sensitive state secrets from some of the world's most-powerful governments. The Fifth Estate screened at the 2013 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: A Bronx Tale

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: A desperate thief has just 12 hours to steal $10 million and save his daughter from his vengeful former partner in this fast-paced action thriller reuniting Nicolas Cage and director Simon West (Con Air, The Expendables 2). Determined to get the payout for a major heist gone awry, a degenerate criminal (Josh Lucas) kidnaps the daughter (Sami Gayle) of his one-time partner-in-crime (Cage), and threatens her life if he doesn't have the money in 12 hours. Now, with the clock ticking and his daughter trapped in a random taxi being driven around New Orleans, the frantic ex-con enlists the help of a former associate (Malin Akerman) to help pull off the heist that will save his little girl's life. Danny Huston and M.C. Gainey also star(n)

programme.desc: Grandpa Got Run Over By His Grandkids. Tough-talking bar and nightclub owner Jon Taffer helps bar managers get more money and less stress out of their troubled establishments. programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Swanky Troubles. Jon visits a failing Philadelphia champagne bar that has layout and menu issues(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Gettin' Jigger With It. Jon visits a historical bar owned by a brother and sister in conflict over profits and responsibilities(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Danny Sits on His Fanny. A rookie bar owner turns a community staple into a bottomless money, forcing Jon to utilize a hostile takeover(n)

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: A Roman soldier in biblical times has a crisis of faith when he witnesses firsthand the death and resurrection of Jesus Christ(n)

programme.title: Big
programme.desc: Oft-imitated but never bettered, Big stars Tom Hanks at the peak of his '80s comedy powers. He captures the innocent energy of youth perfectly as a 12-year-old stuck in a 30-something body. Genius(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus befriends a prehistoric human child as he embarks on a journey to reunite with his family(n)

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: Robin Williams hit the box office jackpot as a dad passing himself off as a Scottish nanny to see his kids. Pierce Brosnan is his romantic rival in a great comedy(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: The late Tony Scott's remake of the 1974 thriller, starring John Travolta and Denzel Washington. It's a day that the passengers on a New York subway train are unlikely to forget. And it's one that could rescue the professional life of subway employee Walter Garber, whose glittering career has been derailed by allegations of corruption. Garber is languishing on duty as a train dispatcher when all hell breaks loose after one of the Lexington Avenue line trains is hijacked by a gang led by the supremely self-assured, calmly ruthless Ryder. Ryder issues a demand for $10m and makes it clear that he won't hesitate to kill anyone who gets in his way. Garber and NYPD hostage negotiator Lieutenant Camonetti attempt to get to grips with the crisis but, as events progress, suspicions arise as to whether there's more to the hijacking than first meets the eye. Also starring James Gandolfini as New York's mayor and Luis Guzmán as a disgruntled subway worker who has joined Ryder's gang(n)

programme.title: Days of Thunder
programme.desc: Cole Trickle enters the high-pressure world of Nascar racing. He's a hot driver with a hot temper, and this attitude gets him into trouble not only with other drivers, but members of his own team as well(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Drama about successful asset manager Derek, whose life becomes a living hell when he hires a beautiful but apparently unhinged temp. As office temp Lisa becomes more fixated with her boss, she goes to increasingly extreme lengths to win his attention. As flirting turns into aggressive come-ons and fully fledged stalking, Derek's wife realises that a fight is on to keep her family from the blonde's clutches(n)

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Michael Douglas stars as the loving husband and father who has a fling with Glenn Close only to find that when he tries to distance himself from her, he's caught in the web of a manipulative and increasingly violent woman. Adrian Lyne's Oscar-winning drama isn't just a thriller but a film that explores fidelity, sexual mores and the role of career women in the 80s (and also gave the world the phrase 'bunny-boiler')(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: You Lied To My Face. As Ghost moves forward with his new business, the St. Patrick family is thrust into the public eye. Also spotlighted: Tasha seeks out Silver and their relationship deepens; and when Tommy returns, Dre talks himself into a promotion(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 2
programme.desc: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam. Chan is Chief Inspector Lee of the Royal Hong Kong Police, who travels back to China with his American colleague, Los Angeles detective James Carter. The men intend to take some vacation time but are quickly pulled into the case of two murdered U.S. customs agents. Lee and Carter are soon embroiled in a dangerous mystery(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: They're beautiful, they're brilliant, and they can kick your butt -- the most glamorous private eyes in the world are back in action in this big-screen adaptation of the popular '70s television series(n)

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: In this riveting adaptation of the best-selling novel, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks to unravel a mystery involving Dante's "The Divine Comedy" and stop a terrorist from unleashing a devastating biological weapon(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: Tom Hiddleston stars as country-music legend Hank Williams in this biopic about the performer's rise to stardom and tragic death at the age of 29. During his fascinating life -- from his youthful marriage to aspiring singer Audrey Mae Sheppard (Elizabeth Olsen) to his stint on a weekly radio show in Alabama to his residency at the Grand Ole Opry -- Williams struggles with alcoholism and addiction. I Saw the Light received its world premiere at the 2015 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.desc: They're beautiful, they're brilliant, and they can kick your butt -- the most glamorous private eyes in the world are back in action in this big-screen adaptation of the popular '70s television series(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: You Lied To My Face. As Ghost moves forward with his new business, the St. Patrick family is thrust into the public eye. Also spotlighted: Tasha seeks out Silver and their relationship deepens; and when Tommy returns, Dre talks himself into a promotion(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: It's Done. When Ghost sees that the location for the business is gang-infested, he re-teams with Tommy to clean it up. As Tommy threatens war, his organization starts to destabilize. Tariq is unhappy and looks to some old friends(n)

programme.title: Orgazmo
programme.desc: An aspiring actor from Utah exchanges his high religious principles for big money and exposure when he opts to star in a porno film. He thought no one would ever see the film, but he was wrong. Off-beat filmmaker Trey Parker wrote, directed, and stars in this debauched comedy(n)

programme.title: Bad Girls
programme.desc: In this thrilling and feminist Western, four prostitutes must flee their brothel after one of them murders a colonel who tried to rape a fellow working girl. Later, the women reinvent themselves as gunslinging vigilantes(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Director Stephen Chow made his name in this country with the deliriously wonderful Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle continues his love of comedy kung-fu films. Set in pre-revolutionary China, Chow plays Sing, a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alley's residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights that owe as much to Kill Bill (some of the wire work is done by Yuen Wo Ping, who worked on Tarantino's film) as they do to classic Hollywood silent comedies. Film fans can enjoy Chow's references to films ranging from Top Hat to The Shining while the rest can just enjoy a wildly entertaining romp. In Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: Follow-up to the satirical revival of the 70s TV sitcom 'The Brady Bunch', transplanting the family to 90s Los Angeles. A stranger turns up and claims to be Carol's first husband(n)

programme.title: The Family Stone
programme.desc: The Stones, a New England family, have their annual holiday gathering. The eldest son brings his girlfriend home to meet his parents, brothers and sisters. The bohemian Stones greet their visitor--a high-powered, controlling New Yorker--with a mix of awkwardness, confusion and hostility(n)

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: An undercover agent is taken under the wing of boss Lefty(n)

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Inspirational documentary that follows two high-school basketball players over four years as they set their sights on college scholarships and a chance to play in the NBA(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Night of the Crash. In the Season 3 premiere, the clan deals with the loss of a family member(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Ritual. In the aftermath of the tragedy, the Calloways and Vaughns comfort one another(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Age of Umbrage. When Cam's words during an interview are taken out of context, the result is a scandal that envelops the whole family(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Photoshoot. Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: No Child Left Behind. Cassie gets a DNA test to learn more about her ancestry, and meets a family who helps her experience newfound cultural traditions. Meanwhile, Reggie and Cam try ditch Uncle Julius' gun(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Guests. Cam and Reggie return to Boston for a wedding; M-Chuck engages in new relationships with a number of women(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Mystery Team. Reggie and Flaherty are at odds over Cam's contract extension(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Second Thoughts. After uncovering secrets about the family's past, Cam must deal with the fallout(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Father's Day. Reggie must deal with the surprise arrival of his father in Atlanta, and Cassie is introduced to Chen's parents(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Apocalyptic thriller in which life on Earth is threatened by a rogue comet. When a reporter in pursuit of a Washington sex scandal is arrested by the FBI, she discovers that the story is an inconsequential part of a huge cover-up. She soon finds herself in possession of the biggest story in the history of humankind: that a comet will destroy the planet in one year's time, unless a risky joint US-Russian outer-space mission can deflect it(n)

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old US soldier named Billy Lynn and his company fight in a horrific battle in Iraq, and soon return to the States for a promotional tour involving a military celebration during an American football game(n)

programme.title: Edge of Winter
programme.desc: A divorced man tries to reconnect with his two sons during a hunting trip in the wilderness, but the brothers realise that they might not be able to trust their father when a fierce snowstorm strands all of them in a deserted cabin(n)

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Director Roland Emmerich went from "Independence Day" to the War for Independence with this sweeping epic about a pacifist (Mel Gibson) who takes up arms against the British in 1776 South Carolina. Gibson is sensational as Benjamin Martin, who seeks an "alternative to war"---until a British officer guns down his teenage son. Heath Ledger costars as another son who enlists. Joely Richardson(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: US Marine Anthony Swofford may be a top sniper, but will he ever get to take the shot he's been trained for? Boredom and bullets in Sam Mendes' gritty Gulf War drama(n)

programme.desc: It's Done. When Ghost sees that the location for the business is gang-infested, he re-teams with Tommy to clean it up. As Tommy threatens war, his organization starts to destabilize. Tariq is unhappy and looks to some old friends(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: After making a striking directorial debut with her screen adaptation of The Virgin Suicides, Sofia Coppola offers a story of love and friendship blooming under unlikely circumstances in this comedy drama. Bob Harris (Bill Murray) is a well-known American actor whose career has gone into a tailspin; needing work, he takes a very large fee to appear in a commercial for Japanese whiskey to be shot in Tokyo. Feeling no small degree of culture shock in Japan, Bob spends most of his non-working hours at his hotel, where he meets Charlotte (Scarlett Johansson) at the bar. Twentysomething Charlotte is married to John (Giovanni Ribisi), a successful photographer who is in Tokyo on an assignment, leaving her to while away her time while he works. Beyond their shared bemusement and confusion with the sights and sounds of contemporary Tokyo, Bob and Charlotte share a similar dissatisfaction with their lives; the spark has gone out of Bob's marriage, and he's become disillusioned with his career. Meanwhile, Charlotte is puzzled with how much John has changed in their two years of marriage, while she's been unable to launch a creative career of her own. Bob and Charlotte become fast friends, and as they explore Tokyo, they begin to wonder if their sudden friendship might be growing into something more(n)

programme.title: Oscar and Lucinda
programme.desc: Eccentric Australian love story about a preacher with a gambling addiction and his love for a beautiful heiress with a mutual love for playing games at high stakes. Ralph Fiennes, Cate Blanchett, Ciaran Hinds, Tom Wilkinson, Richard Roxburgh, Clive Russell, Bille Brown, Josephine Byrnes, Barnaby Kay, Barry Otto, Linda Bassett, Geoffrey Rush(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: In this offbeat comedy from Woody Allen, nothing can snap a cynical philosophy professor out of a mental funk, except for a young student whose presence offers a breath of fresh air in his otherwise unfulfilling existence(n)

programme.title: Broken Flowers
programme.desc: Ageing lothario Don sets out on a quest to find his old girlfriends, after he receives an anonymous letter claiming that he has a 19-year-old son. Comedy drama which won the Grand Jury prize at Cannes(n)

programme.title: Rio, I Love You
programme.desc: Another installment of the Cities of Love franchise, this anthology film depicts romantic encounters in different neighborhoods of Rio de Janeiro. In all, ten shorts helmed by celebrated directors are woven together to spin a tale of love in "the Marvelous City." Directors include Fernando Meirelles, José Padilha, Paolo Sorrentino, and John Turturro. Vincent Cassel, Harvey Keitel, Emily Mortimer, Vanessa Paradis, and Wagner Moura star in the various segments(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: The Young Victoria
programme.desc: Queen Victoria deals with turbulent 19th-century politics while coping with societal pressure to marry someone other than her true love, Prince Albert(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: In this offbeat comedy from Woody Allen, nothing can snap a cynical philosophy professor out of a mental funk, except for a young student whose presence offers a breath of fresh air in his otherwise unfulfilling existence(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake is left to raise his daughter, Katie, on his own after his wife dies in a car accident and he suffers a mental breakdown. He struggles with daily routines and his relatives intend to take Katie away, but Jake knows that he has to hold on to the one thing that he loves the most - his daughter(n)

programme.title: Broken Flowers
programme.desc: Ageing lothario Don sets out on a quest to find his old girlfriends, after he receives an anonymous letter claiming that he has a 19-year-old son. Comedy drama which won the Grand Jury prize at Cannes(n)

programme.title: Basquiat
programme.desc: An unusual film examining the turbulent life of noted postmodern artist Jean-Michel Basquiat, from his first graffiti works as 'Samo,' his collaborations with Andy Warhol in the 1980s, and his tragic death from a heroin overdose. Jeffrey Wright, David Bowie, Dennis Hopper, Gary Oldman, Michael Wincott, Claire Forlani, Benicio Del Toro, Courtney Love, Julian Schnabel(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Psychedelic road movie, adapted from Hunter S Thompson's cult novel, about a journalist and his attorney friend who drive from LA to Las Vegas on a huge drugs binge, finding paranoia and misadventure at every turn(n)

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: A married couple find their love affair with alcohol threatening to unravel their relationship when the time comes to confront their addiction head on. Charlie (Aaron Paul) and Kate (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) are a fun-loving couple, but their heavy drinking is starting to become a problem. As Kate constructs a series of elaborate lies to conceal her addiction from her co-workers, her relationship with her mother begins to deteriorate. Realizing that she needs to get sober in order to pull out of her downward spiral, she finds that Charlie is reluctant to join her, and starts to see their relationship in a new light. Meanwhile, once she gathers the courage to set the bottle aside, the real fight begins. Octavia L. Spencer, Nick Offerman, and Megan Mullally co-star(n)
Story of New York's infamous Studio 54 that attracted stars and starlets looking to party in the disco era(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal. Revealing how he changed from a once-idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage. Dir: Robert De Niro(n)

programme.title: The Boxer
programme.desc: Jim Sheridan (In the Name of the Father) co-scripted (with Terry George) and directed this drama about an Irish professional fighter. Filmed in Dublin(n)

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Kristin Stewart and Dakota Fanning star in Floria Sigismondi's rock biopic, based on Cherie Curie's autobiographical account. It's the mid-1970s and Southern Californian teen Joan Larkin has changed her name to Joan Jett. Along with her new dark, edgy identity comes a nascent desire: to create an all-girl rock band. Joan and her aggressive manager Kim Fowley stumble across the perfect face for the band: the 15-year-old blonde bombshell Cherie Curie. The two girls become close, with Cherie's sweet melodies slickly harmonising with Joan's electrifying guitar solos to great effect. They name themselves The Runaways and, after recruiting a lead guitarist and a bass player, are soon signed to Mercury Records, plunging them into the deep end of 70s rock excess. The success of their first album is massive. But, after a concert in Japan, the rest of the band discover magazines that feature only pictures of Cherie inside them - and are furious that they've been left out. Cherie begins to crumble under the pressures of being the face of the band, and starts to find solace in alcohol and drugs. As the band's stability disintegrates, can the girls rediscover the fun, runaway rock and roll lifestyle they sought?(n)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Comic drama about a professor suffering from writer's block trying to deal with the pressures of his complex love life and his troubled students' assorted problems. Despite the encouragement of one his admiring female pupils, the professor is obsessed with his current work. He finds release in his friendship with a lonely but gifted student, but the news of his lover's pregnancy further complicates his already difficult life(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth
programme.desc: This portrait of England's "Virgin Queen" (Cate Blanchett) is a lush, romantic political thriller about the tumultuous reign of Elizabeth I, whose love for the dashing and duplicitous Earl of Leicester interferes with her duties to her troubled country, which could benefit from a political marriage to a French or Spanish nobleman. Joseph Fiennes, Geoffrey Rush(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I falls for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh and clashes with the King of Spain(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal. Revealing how he changed from a once-idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage. Dir: Robert De Niro(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: Cadillac Records
programme.desc: The story of the blues in 1950s Chicago is told in Sony BMG Film's Cadillac Records, a musical drama written and directed by TV veteran Darnell Martin. The film stars Adrien Brody as Chess Records founder Leonard Chess, with Jeffrey Wright portraying R&B legend Muddy Waters, Cedric the Entertainer as Willie Dixon, Beyoncé Knowles as Etta James, and Mos Def doing his best Chuck Berry(n)

programme.title: Whiteboys
programme.desc: Danny Hoch brings down da house as a rap-happy white Iowan who longs to move---along with his equally white posse (Dash Mihok, Mark Webber)---to a notoriously dangerous Chicago project, where he hopes to make a name for himself as a gangsta-rap star. Although the boy'z are from the heartland, he claims he's "still got the ghetto in my heart." Rappers Snoop Doggy Dogg and Dr. Dre have cameos. Piper Perabo, Eugene Byrd(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A frustrated cartoonist awaiting the birth of his first child is forced to reconnect with his dysfunctional family when his mother is diagnosed with a brain tumor(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Distinguished by a sharp, witty dialogue between its two cop protagonists, Ray and Danny (Gregory Hines and Billy Crystal), this entertaining crime drama is well worth a visit. Ray and Danny are nearly blown away by super bad guy Julio (Jimmy Smits), and their boss is peeved at them as usual. So the two are given a holiday from their beat in Chicago and travel to the sunny shores of Key West. They like it enough to retire from police work and open a business there. But when the duo returns to the Windy City, Julio is about to pull off a big drug deal and retirement may not be such a good idea(n)

programme.title: Kiss Me Goodbye
programme.desc: Sally Field stars in this romantic comedy as a widow on the verge of re-marrying when the spirit of her late husband re-appears(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Steve Martin plays Bobby Bowfinger, a would-be movie producer and charlatan who desperately needs a hit film to repay his debts. Bringing together a cast of oddballs, he dupes superstar actor Eddie Murphy into starring in his low-budget picture. Sharp comedy, with an experienced cast including Heather Graham(n)

programme.desc: A stand-up set by Gina Yashere(n)

programme.desc: A frustrated cartoonist awaiting the birth of his first child is forced to reconnect with his dysfunctional family when his mother is diagnosed with a brain tumor(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy concerning the efforts of a hapless gym proprietor and his clients to fend off the acquisitive attentions of a rival bodybuilding empire with designs on their virtually bankrupt facility. To generate much-needed cash, they enter a team in the national dodgeball competition and set themselves on course for a bruising showdown with a team representing their foes(n)

programme.title: Imagine Me & You
programme.desc: Boy meets girl, boy falls for girl, boy marries girl, girl on wedding day falls for a female florist. It's a thorny dilemma indeed, and writer-director Ol Parker mines it for non-stop laughs and a bit of engaging sentiment. Piper Perabo and Lena Headey star as the ladies in love. Matthew Goode is very good as Perabo's jilted husband, and Darren Boyd is a scene-stealer as Goode's best friend who, despite knowing the bride's friend is a lesbian, doubles his efforts to woo her(n)

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: Vianne's new chocolate shop is raising eyebrows and indignant, pious mayor Reynaud doesn't like it one bite. The confectioner's beauty, and her mysterious hold over the townsfolk, prompt Reynaud to plot against her. But the arrival of Irish gypsy Roux may give her the ally she needs(n)

programme.desc: In this delicious dose of cinematic insanity from the director of "Running Scared," a Southern pawn shop connects three outrageous tales involving kidnapping, racist meth heads and an inept Elvis impersonator(n)

programme.desc: Lovelorn Ben Stiller hires sleazy investigator Matt Dillon to track down high school sweetheart Cameron Diaz. Gross-out gag fest. Contains strong language/sexual scenes(n)

programme.desc: Samuel has everything he's always wanted: a gorgeous girlfriend, San Francisco home, a fast car and... a baby? When Rebecca tells him she's pregnant, he's thrown into total confusion(n)
